title: Taylor Farms TX, Inc. Recalls Chicken Products Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 2, 2019 Taylor Farms TX, Inc., a Dallas, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 2,100 pounds of chicken products incorrectly labeled as Chile Relleno products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today...

establishment.name: Taylor Farms TX, Inc.
establishment.address:
1171 N. Cockrell Hill Rd. 
  Dallas, TX 75211

impacted_products: 10-oz. tray packages labeled as “HEB-MEAL SIMPLE CHILE RELLENO” with “USE BY” dates of 02/04/2019, 02/05/2019, 02/07/2019, 02/08/2019, and 02/09/2019 and lot codes TFD025AU4, TFD026AU4, TFD028AU4, TFD029AU4 and TFD030AU4.
